TopicTitle: Minor suggestion for the new fonts

Articles.Content:
I'm talking specifically about the ones that appear on screen messages, like changing cameras, quicksave/quickload, etc.

First of all, they're awesome, crisp and stand out, way better than the old ones on lower resolutions; but I think the dark outline could be made just a little more subtle. As it is, it seems as thick as the inner yellow line, which makes them stand out more than the yellow itself (since there's a black line on either side, but just a single yellow in the middle).

Anyone else thinks so, too?
Colour and contrast in fonts is very subjective.  If anything can be done, I'd hope for a colour picker and font size scaler.
